summary:
This just makes items glow, so they are easier to see.

Coins
Lockpicks
Coin purses
Gems (flawless and normal)
Ore
Ingots
Leather
Leather strips
Arrows
Bolts
Keys
descriptionHtml:
I\'m not working on this mod anymore. I\"m putting my focus on my new glowing items mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37730/?tab=4&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fthread_id%3D1025764%26mod_id%3D37730]GLowing items V2[/url]


[center][color=Gold][size=15]Glowing items[/size][/color][/center] 
[line]
[center][color=Gold][size=4]by bwins95[/size][/color][/center] 
[color=Gold][size=3]Version             :[/size][/color]1.8
[color=Gold][size=3]Date                :[/size][/color]08/13/2012
[color=Gold][size=3]Category            :[/size][/color]Models and textures
[color=Gold][size=3]Mod\'s Website        :[/size][/color]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24707
[line] 
[line] 

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Small items glow so they are easier to see.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Skyrim
Coins
Lockpicks
Coin purses
Gems (flawless and normal)
Ore
Ingots
Leather
Leather strips
Keys
----
Dawnguard
Arrows (sun hollowed, blood stained, and dragon bone)
Bolts
----
Hearthfire
Stone mine
Clay pile
Clay brick
Lock
Hinge
Iron fitting
Quarried stone
Glass




The arrows and bolts will only glow after they are shot. pre-placed arrows and bolts will not glow. the sun hollowed arrow has a glow map, so it glows all the time. arrows in quivers will not glow.
This is intended to have hdr or bloom enabled to make them glow.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]History[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Version 2.0
Split the single file into three Skyrim, Dawngaurd, and Hearthfire. Added Stone mine, Clay pile, Clay brick, Lock, Hinge, Iron fitting, Quarried stone, Glass,

1.9A
   Fixed missing color blind key picture and added missing Key meshes for color blind all items

Version 1.9
   Added Keys and changed the color of mines

Version 1.8
    Added bolts and arrows.

Version 1.7
    Added potion (Health, Stamina, and Magic) and Mines. 

Version 1.6
    Added fomod installer. 

Version 1.5
    Added Leather and Leather strips. Updated All in one and All in one - colorblind version with new items. 

Version 1.4
    Added Ore and Ingots 

Version 1.2
    Fixed lockpick file path. now the lockpick glows. 

Version 1.1
    Added coin purses and lockpicks 

Version 1.0
    Uploaded Glowing coins. Added images of coins,Added readme and Change log. [/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Upgrade[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Replace the meshes and textures with the new ones.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Incompatibilities[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]The glowing mines are incompatible with glowing ore viens 300.  it adds a cube map that mine does not have and they are the same mesh.

As long as the texture file path is the same as the original new textures will still work.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Contact[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]PM me on the nexus[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Credits[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center][/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Extract the data folder and drop it in the Skyrim folder. the folder path will drop everything in it\'s correct place.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Download it to the manager and check the box next to it.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Remove the meshes and textures.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Disable the mod and delete it.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[list]
[*][url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifScope[/url] 
[*][url=http://www.adobe.com/africa/products/photoshop.html?kw=p&sdid=JTAJR&skwcid=TC|22636|photoshop||S|b|26174987875]Photoshop[/url] 
[*][url=http://www.gimp.org/]GIMP[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] 
[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on th steam network.
[*][url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7Zip[/url] 
[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Mod Dependencies[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]To make Bolts, Sun hollowed arrows, Blood stained arrows, and Dragonbone arrows glow you need dawnguard.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Future Plans[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]If you would like to see an item glow, leave a comment or PM me.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Legal and Licensing[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Before you use the content first contact me and ask for permission[/center] 
[line]

[center][size=5][color=Gold]ReadMe generated with: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22340]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url][/color][/size][/center] 
[line]
